    • hitman

      public void hitman()
      finds animals in bears kill list and kills them.

    • breed

      void breed(Animal partner)
      Handles the process of bear breeding. When two bears meet the conditions for breeding (both are adults, have sufficient energy, and have not already bred during this cycle), this method creates a new bear as their offspring. The child inherits the parents' territory.
      Specified by:
      breed in class Animal
      Parameters:
      partner - The other bear participating in the breeding process.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the partner is not a bear.

    • isBreedable

      public boolean isBreedable()
      Checks if the animal checks off criteria to breed.
      Overrides:
      isBreedable in class Animal
      Returns:
      Returns true if all criteria for breeding are met otherwise returns false.

    • attemptBreeding

      void attemptBreeding()
      Attempts to find a suitable breeding partner in the adjacent tiles. A bear will attempt to breed with another bear if the following conditions are met: - Both bears are adults. - Both have sufficient energy for breeding. - Neither bear has already bred during that day. If a suitable partner is found, the `breed` method is called.

    • checkForIllegalActivity

      void checkForIllegalActivity()
      Checks if an animal enters the bears territory and sets it as a target. Does not target family members.

    • sleeperTime

      void sleeperTime()
      Goes back to its territory and sleeps.

    • isInsideTerritory

      boolean isInsideTerritory()
      Check if the bear is inside its territory

      whether the bear is in the terrotory.

      public ArrayList<Plant> findNearbyPlants(itumulator.world.World world, Animal me)
      Finds all nearby berryBushes within the vision range. Overidden from default method.
      Specified by:
      findNearbyPlants in interface Herbivorous
      Returns:
